TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat Minogoth. You must try again.
You quickly take the Skull of Sartek before Minogoth can return to full power. You also take Minogoth's armor.
Tauron takes the final piece of Sartek. The task is complete.
You must travel to Ohtar and steal the Skull of Sartek from Minogoth.
You must return the Skull of Sartek to Tauron at the Horned Temple.
